text: Ezɨ a 4 plan enselɨn kaba ataki, eghtɨ me 3 plan okuruabar gumazamiziba tuiragham, egh okuruatam bar a mɨsueghtɨ an arɨmɨghiregham. God faragha ghaze, auan kam ko aruer kam ko iakinir kam ko azenir kamɨn enselɨn kaba ingangarir kam damuam. Ezɨ enselɨn kaba kalabusɨn ikia uari akɨrigha ingangarir kam damuasavɨra dughiar kamɨn mɨzua iti.
